# HIDElementCollection.CollectionType

**Enumeration**

Types of [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDElementCollection]s.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CollectionType
```

## Overview

Collection types are a defined part of the HID specification that define how a collection is intended to be used.

See the HID specification for more details: [https://www.usb.org/hid].

## Enumeration Cases

- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.application**
- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.logical**
- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.namedArray**
- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.physical**
- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.report**
- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.usageModifier**
- **HIDElementCollection.CollectionType.usageSwitch**

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: HIDElementCollection.CollectionType
